page.title: 01Life in Pendock today
page.content: Pendock today is used mostly for farm land, so most people who work here are farmers. Only a few people who live and work in the area are not farmers. The reason for people not working in the area is because there are no jobs available.Today more people are coming from other places to live in Pendock. Near me I have two families one came from Australia and the other came from London. Everybody in Pendock has a car because we only have the bus on Mondays and Wednesdays. On the Monday the bus goes to Ledbury and on a Wednesday it goes to Gloucester. In our area there are two schools Pendock School and Berrow Wood School. Since the M50 has been built it has cut Pendock in half.
